item.title: Trump names longtime ally Kash Patel to lead FBI
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump announced Saturday that he plans on firing FBI director Christopher Wray and replacing him with longtime ally Kash Patel.

item.title: Biden Thanksgiving holiday part of longer farewell as Trump White House return nears
item.description: Joe Biden is on Nantucket, wrapping up his final Thanksgiving holiday as president

item.title: Trump, Trudeau meet at Mar-a-Lago amid tariff threats
item.description: The meeting comes after Trump threatened sweeping 25% tariffs on goods from Mexico and Canada.

item.title: Third candidate enters DNC chair race, setting up tight contest
item.description: The New York Democrat said he intends to point to his successful record in his district that favors President-elect Donald Trump.

item.title: Counties declare state of emergency as they brace for massive snowstorm
item.description: Officials upstate New York are preparing for a major snowstorm that is forecasted to drop over two feet of snow.
